column1: UAE is a procedure to treat fibroids using radiology instead of surgery.
Small plastic or gelatin particles were injected into the blood vessels that carry blood to the fibroids.
Your doctor will give you a prescription for pain medicine.
- Ask your doctor how long you should wait before having sexual activity.
Try using warm compresses or a heating pad for pelvic pain.
Ask your doctor how long you should avoid using tampons or douching.
